title: Entering Home Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Entering Home Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Entering Home Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 18
items.arabic: (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا، ثُمَّ لِيُسَلِّمْ عَلَى أَهْلِهِ).
